package.name: fanuc_lrmate200id_moveit_plugins

description.p: MoveIt plugins for the Fanuc LR Mate 200iD (and variants).

This package contains plugins for use with MoveIt and Fanuc LR Mate 200iD manipulators. Plugins included support the base model and the /7L. See the Fanuc LR Mate 200iD support package for information on used joint angle and velocity limits.
Before using any of the plugins included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)

export.deprecated: All IKFast MoveIt plugins are deprecated and will be removed from future releases. Where possible, they will be replaced with OPW Kinematics-based plugins.
